div.class: alert alert-danger alert-dismissible fade show text-center

body.div:
Franklin Local School District is complying with Governor DeWine’s order to extend the school closure due to COVID-19 until May 1, 2020. Our teachers will continue sending out assignments so that learning continues in an alternative manner. Staff members’ emails are listed on the website’s directory if you need to contact someone. Please continue to listen to all call messages and check email. Be kind! Stay home to stay healthy!
×

a.div: Parents & Guardians - click here to be taken to our District Directory where you can view teacher email addresses

div.h1: Food Request for Non School-Aged Children in Franklin Local School District
div.p:
We have developed our All Hands Mondays to provide 5 breakfast and 5 lunch meals each week for each child ages 1-18 that live
in the Franklin Local School District!

div.div:
@McDermottFLSD
RT @PhiloChoirs: Celebrating our Philo Seniors. Delivered signs from Roseville all the way to Norwich. Stay strong class of 2020! (Pt 1/2)…

div.p: View academic, athletic, and community events. The events for the 2018 - 2019 School Year can be viewed as a list or a full month.
Easily view student averages, assignments, homework, participation, teacher messages, attendance, teacher web pages, and more.
See what's for lunch today, April 24, 2020, and the entire month. Nutrition information can be accessed through Food Service.
Information to give parents and students knowledge about the bus routes, the bus drivers’ names, and the bus numbers.
Report bullying, harassment or intimidation at your school or online here.
